class.name: CellMaterialND
class.brief_description: Cell material for ND cell meshes.
class.description: CellMaterialND is a material for ND cell meshes. It provides a user-friendly way to color cell meshes using single colors, per-vertex colors, per-cell colors, per-cell UVW coordinates, or ND texture colors. CellMaterialND can be set on a [CellMeshND] resource to define how the cell mesh should be colored, and/or overridden on a specific [MeshInstanceND] node.

members.member: The single albedo color of the material. When the [constant MaterialND.COLOR_SOURCE_FLAG_SINGLE_COLOR] albedo source flag is set, this is used as the color of the entire cell mesh. If other albedo source flags are also set, this acts as a modulate color, multiplying with the other colors.

The albedo color array of the material. This may be used to color various parts of the mesh, depending on the albedo source flags. When one of the [constant Material4D.COLOR_SOURCE_FLAG_PER_VERT], [constant Material4D.COLOR_SOURCE_FLAG_PER_EDGE], or [constant Material4D.COLOR_SOURCE_FLAG_PER_CELL] albedo source flags are set, this array is used to color those respective parts of the mesh.
The albedo source flags of the [CellMaterialND]. For cell materials, valid values are everything in [enum MaterialND.ColorSourceFlagsND] except for per-edge colors.
